root: ^We bid thou welcome to our station.
^There are no facades; all are welcome.
^Take respite and bask in the bulbous splendor of our collection, whose origins far precede thy reality.
^And worry not; we know already of thy quest.
^Yet first, we require thy assistance collecting one final orb.
^Should'st thou prove thy self worthy of our aid by replacing that orb to its proper shrine, we would fain assist thy crusade
